name: Morph Animals
description:
A game like you've never seen before, Morph Animals 👱‍♂️🐺🐴🐻🦄!

Transform yourself into different animals to complete quests and explore the world.
Each animal has its unique abilities. Make sure to morph into the correct animal to complete your challenge 🪄!


Defeat enemies around the world and become more powerful.
You can use different morphs for different enemies 🦄!


Complete quests to unlock MORE!
You can find quests around the map 🌍.
At the end of each quest, you will get some rewards 💰.


Collect, buy, sell, or even CRAFT resources to fill your inventory.
The best way to get artifacts/ resources is by defeating enemies ⚔️.


Unveil the lore of Morph Animals.
Will you be able to complete and unveil the game's lore 👀?
